name: Halloween on Eldritch St
description:
It's Halloween on Eldritch St. Now is your chance to get some candy. Knock on every door but be careful some of these residents may see you as the treat.

This is a fun simply short game with some scary themes.

Thank you to all the streamers that let me us them and their OCs and sorry to all the people I wanted to put in but had no time. That is what I get for choosing to make a game 2 weeks before the holiday, 

Happy Gaming and Happy Halloween.
